entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Gravenhurst
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:54 a.m. EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 7.9Â°C

entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 12.
entry.summary: Showers. Amount 15 to 25 mm. High 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
